Text: Annual Survey on Excellence in Investor Relations WXNBDear World Investor Link User World Investor Link invites you to improve investor relations by casting your vote for the th Annual Investor Relations Magazine US Awards held in association with Barrons We want to know what sophisticated individual investors think about the current financial market environment Important developments have taken place to make the marketplace more individualinvestor friendly US corporations now recognizing the importance of individual investors have made information that was formerly available only to the professional institutional investor available to you But some corporations do a better job in making their corporate information accessible and useable for the individual investor We want to know which US corporations in your opinion are the best at communicating with the individual investor The companies that receive the most votes will be recognized at the Investor Relations US Awards Please take a few minutes to participate in this survey Just click on the following URL or copy and paste the URL into your web browser to participate bbarronsrelationsixaspPINWXNB Your personal password PIN WXNB Your votes will make US companies understand the information and data you need from them to make informed investment decisions Please be assured that your identity will be kept completely confidential The results will only be used in combination with other World Investor Link users to determine the Investor Relations US Awards winners If this isnt a convenient time for you to participate you can participate any time before February th by using the above URL and password Thanks you for your time and cooperation in this project Sincerely Nancy S Christman Vice President Marketing World Investor Link

Annual Survey on Excellence in Investor Relations WXNBDear World Investor Link User Recently we contacted you about casting your vote for the th Annual Investor Relations Magazine US Awards held in association with Barrons We want to know what sophisticated individual investors think about the current financial market environment Important developments have taken place to make the marketplace more individualinvestor friendly US corporations now recognizing the importance of individual investors have made information that was formerly available only to the professional institutional investor available to you But some corporations do a better job in making their corporate information accessible and useable for the individual investor We want to know which US corporations in your opinion are the best at communicating with the individual investor The companies that receive the most votes will be recognized at the Investor Relations US Awards If youve already responded wed like to thank you for your help with this important project If you havent had a chance wed like you to please take a few minutes to participate in this survey Just click on the following URL or copy and paste the URL into your web browser to participate bbarronsrelationsixaspPINWXNB Your personal password PIN WXNB Your votes will make US companies understand the information and data you need from them to make informed investment decisions Please be assured that your identity will be kept completely confidential The results will only be used in combination with other World Investor Link users to determine the Investor Relations US Awards winners If this isnt a convenient time for you to participate you can participate any time before February th by using the above URL and password Thanks you for your time and cooperation in this project Sincerely Nancy S Christman Vice President Marketing World Investor Link
